tog-watchlisthidesubpages: [[Special:Preferences]], tab 'Watchlist'. Offers user to add deleted pages to watchlist.
subpagewatchlist-rcshowsubpages: Message to trigger option in Special:Watchlist when not using the javascript (structured) interface
subpagewatchlist-rcfilter-showsubpages-l: Label for filter on Special:Watchlist when using structured (javascript) interface
subpagewatchlist-rcfilter-showsubpages-d: Description of filter on Special:Watchlist. Shown under {{msg-mw|subpagewatchlist-rcfilter-showsubpages-label}}.
subpagewatchlist-enotif-body: Similar to {{msg-mw|enotif_body}}. Text of email sent to user when someone edits a subpage of a page on the watchlist.
